meanings.definition: To have a feeling of surprise or curiosity
meanings.sent1: She wondered about the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I wondered why the flowers bloomed so early.
meanings.sent3: The cat wondered at the sudden appearance of a mouse.
meanings.sent4: His eyes widened as he wondered at the magic trick.
meanings.sent5: The children wondered at the colorful parade passing by.

meanings.definition: To ask oneself questions or have doubts about something
meanings.sent1: He wondered if he had locked the door before leaving.
meanings.sent2: They wondered whether the movie would be good.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel wondered if the acorn was too heavy to carry.
meanings.sent4: She wondered if her dreams would ever come true.
meanings.sent5: The student wondered if the answer was correct before submitting the test.
